title: LF Ranked Team
body:
Hello,
I am currently looking for a ranked 5's team, regardless of whether or not we're in pre-season. This is pre-season, hence it's the perfect time to train on collaborating and working well together as a team. 

I can play all roles, however I am not that great at Support or Top.
I am currently Gold 5 in promos to Gold 4.
The team has to have the majority of it's players at Gold or higher.

IGN: PvPRealm
Please, feel free to add me if you think I'd slot into your team.

replies.body: Hey man silver 5 jg and supp, i have been playing pretty poorly just looking for a team to play with consistantly. Feel free too add or pass onto anyone else you know is looking :)
